headline: Amazon Is 'Catching Up' To Microsoft In This Key AI Metric
summary: Amazon stock took a big hit earlier this month.  It came after its Q2 results reignited fears that the tech titan is falling behind cloud rivals Microsoft and Google-parent Alphabet in the race to win AI business.  Amazon will increase it 2025 capital expenditures dedicated to its Amazon Web Services by a similar total — roughly $33 billion in added spending — as Microsoft's Azure and Alphabet's Google Cloud.

headline: Google Backs Kairos Nuclear Deal As Bill Gates' TerraPower Rivalry Heats Up: 'Help America Win The AI Race,' Tennessee Valley Authority CEO Says
summary: Google-backed nuclear startup Kairos Power has entered into an agreement with the Tennessee Valley Authority to supply up to 50 megawatts of electricity from its Hermes 2 reactor to the grid in Tennessee and Alabama by 2030. headline: Business Professionals Predict AI Will Replace Google by 2030
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, August 27, 2025--Google's 25-year dominance of business research may be coming to an end. According to new research from Bospar, half of professionals (50%) believe AI platforms will completely replace Google for business research by 2030, with an additional 34% expecting AI to mostly replace traditional search.

headline: Nvidia Is the Everything Stock. Its Results Will Tell Us About More Than Just AI Demand.
summary: Nvidia sits at the epicenter of the artificial intelligence investment boom, with its chips and servers fueling the trillion dollar digital gold rush to establish dominance in the new technology.  What CEO Jensen Huang has to say about access to markets in China, following a compromise with the White House that allows it to sell H20 chips in exchange for a 15% cut of those revenues going to the U.S. government, will provide keen insight into the state of trade negotiations between Washington and Beijing.  A great deal of that will be spent on Nvidia’s AI powering chips.
